title: Scientists spark fears as 'zombie' volcano dormant for 250,000 years shows signs of eruption
description: Scientists have sparked fears that dormant 'zombie' volcano Uturuncu in Bolivia could erupt for the first time in 250,000 years due to these signs.
content:
